name: Rawalpindi Flying Club (RFC)
about: Rawalpindi Flying Club, established in 1957, is one of the oldest and most prestigious flying clubs in Pakistan. With a rich history of producing some of the finest pilots, RFC has a reputation for excellence in aviation training. The club offers comprehensive flight training programs, including Private Pilot License (PPL) and Commercial Pilot License (CPL), adhering to stringent admission requirements that include specific age, educational, and medical fitness criteria. For foreign students, additional clearance from the Federal Government and Civil Aviation Authority is necessary. RFC is committed to providing high-quality training, ensuring its graduates are well-equipped to succeed in the aviation industry. Visit our website for further details on our programs and admission process.
services:
["Pilot Training
Cabin Crew Training
Aviation Safety / Quality Training
Aviation Support Training
Maintenance Training
Instructor-Led Online Ground Schooling"]
